original_title: Coming of Age: Vol. 5 - Spelen of sterven
overview: This coming of age short film focuses on the award-winning Dutch short, To Play or to Die [Spelen of sterven] (1990), which follows the sensitive, introverted Kees who falls in love with Charel, of all people, the handsome and athletic bully of the class. When he thinks he might be interested in him, he throws himself into a whirlwind of events that ends in a terrible tragedy.
title: Coming of Age: Vol. 5 - To Play or to Die
